attributes.action: The UK should recognize vaccination certificates from the Middle East
attributes.additional_details: We raised a petition on this matter that was rejected. Petition 592505 to which this was compared only deals with UK residents who have a UK GP and one of their vaccinations in the UK. People working in the Gulf region neither have a UK GP or any UK administered vaccinations. The UK now accepts both European & US vaccination certificates, but not those from anywhere else in the World. We request the UK government to accept vaccination certificates from the Middle East.
attributes.background: We have had co-vid vaccinations administered outside the UK. As we have left to work overseas we do not have a UK GP. Therefore we are unable to get a UK vaccine passport. To allow us to travel to the UK without quarantine we ask the UK Government to accept Middle Eastern vaccination certificates

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Recognise all vaccinations using WHO approved vaccines for international travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594456
